android-treble.title: Android Treble: Faster Updates and Easier Upgrades
android-treble.intro: Give out a tour about what is Android Treble at Google Android team, it was first introduced in 8.0/8.1, then enhanced in 9.0 this year. Will briefly cover its technical aspects such as VNDK, Binderized HAL, Build Split, etc.
android-treble.addition:
* Language: 漢語 / Mandarin Chinese
* Audience: Android device makers and hackers
* Difficulty: Begineer / 入門

Merck Hung.speaker: Merck Hung
Merck Hung.name: Merck Hung
Merck Hung.intro: Technical Account Manager in Android Partner Engineering

android.intro: 隨著開源技術的發展與成熟，以及開源社群的活躍，培養出越來越多的本地開源技術人才，加上全球最大規模開源平台 GitHub 的興起，讓更多元化的參與者透過分享、討論、貢獻的過程，使能夠永續共享或創新創造的開源專案得以實現。這股新興開源的能量，儼然已成為各種技術創新的發展策略。台灣雲端物聯網產業協會長期協助推動 Taiwan Open Stack User Group 及 OCP Taiwan 等社群與臺灣產業之互動連結，藉由此次台灣開放原始碼社群聯合推動的 COSCUP 年度研討會，我們將組織邀請在國內成立之新興熱門開源專案代表，分享其專案領域的最新技術進展，進而連結社群開發能量，展現台灣開源創新的堅強實力。 OpenStack: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OpenStack https://www.openstack.org/ Android_x86: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Android-x86 http://www.android-x86.org/
